'''Margaret's Troubles''' is a [[Random Event|randomly occurring World Quest]] that can occur in various places across [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
#Talk to [[Margaret]]
#* She will ask for one of the following:
#**{{Item|Apple|20|x=3}}
#**{{Item|Carrot|20|x=3}}
#**{{Item|Matsutake|20|x=1}}
#**{{Item|Raw Meat|20|x=3}}
#Collect the ingredients give them to Margaret
#*The items will automatically be deducted from the player's Inventory.

==Rewards==
{{Transclude|Random Event|Rewards}}

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Something seems to be troubling Margaret...}}
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talk to Margaret)
:'''Margaret:''' What are you doing here, Traveler?
:'''Margaret:''' I'm out looking for {{Color|buzzword|(Item)}}, but not having much luck so far...
:'''Margaret:''' Could you help me? I only need {{Color|buzzword|(1/3) (Item)(s)}}.
:{{DIcon}} Sure!
::'''Margaret:''' Great! I'll keep looking around here in the meantime.
::'''Margaret:''' When you're done, come and see me.
:{{DIcon}} Sorry, I'm too busy.
::'''Margaret:''' Never mind then. I can keep looking, it'll just take me a lot longer...
:;(Does not accept the quest)
----
;(Talk to Margaret again)
:'''Margaret:''' Found anything yet?
:{{DIcon}} Sure did.
::'''Margaret:''' Let's see... Perfect! This is for you.
:{{DIcon}} I need more time...
::'''Margaret:''' Take all the time you need.
{{Dialogue end}}
